reviewText:
Positive:
-Lot of different vehicles (and horn sounds)
-Combat mechanic is really fun
-The soundtrack alone is probably worth the price

Negative:
-Requires a controller
-AI is possessed by satan himself


You get to kill your friends in space driving an over-weaponised car and then you can honk to mock them when they are dead!

Recommended if you hate your friends! 10/10
voteText: 14 of 15 people (93%) found this review helpful 5 people found this review funny

reviewText:
Best party game ever.  It's multiplayer asteroids!!!  With a very polished overall game design.  It's literally perfect.  Everything from UI, controller support, design aesthetic, the works.  I had a blast playing it.  You can drive batmobiles and Back To The Future's DeLorean among other cars that are designed to look like the real thing (Corvette C3!!).

I can't wait to try this out with friends.  There are a lot of modes like soccer which should be very interesting when you are playing with some buddies.

I guess the only thing they could add is online multiplayer.

SUPER impressed.  ONE BILLION STARS out of 10.  What a time to be alive.  I remember how fun it was to play asteroids back in the day... But multiplayer deathmatch asteroids?  I never would have even imagined this.

Best with friends.  Co-op AI is really difficult but not impossible.
voteText: 15 of 19 people (79%) found this review helpful 2 people found this review funny

reviewText:
The ideal game to play with your friends on the couch to test the strength of your friendship!

Seriously, this is one of the best local multiplayer experiences around. The duration of each match is long enough to for the heat of the competition to come up, but short enough so that everybody can have his own revenge in a matter of minutes.
Skills matter in this game, but in the chaos of action, some luck helps too, so that players who are behind do not feel too overwhelmed and have some chance of getting back in the game.

The game modes are varied and offer a wide choice to suit a group subjective preference. Pong and soccer are especially great and fun.

The action is chaotic and you'll spend enough time after the game talking with your friends about epic moments, unlikely suicides and own-goals and friendly" fire. If your friends are still with you

reviewText:
Hyperdrive Massacre is a simple and fun game that manages to entertain, both single (thanks AI enemies) but especially in multiplayer
There are three modes and all three are well-researched and designed.
Very nice style retro, and soundtrack rock!
In short, Hyperdrive Massacre is a good game, that manages to entertain for several hours, especially with friends!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Tvp3lwnfs0
(Below is the Italian full review)
Hyperdrive Massacre è ispirato ai giochi Spacewar degli anni 80, gioco progettato intorno al multiplayer locale, con un ritmo dinamico e divertente!


Features:
3 Modalità singolo e multiplayer: Deathmatch, Death Race, Last Man Standing

Multiplayer locale fino a 4 giocatori

8 Arene di combattimento

16 macchine diverse

10 Armi da utilizzare

IA Nemica di alto livello

Colonna sonora originale


Parere personale:
Hyperdrive Massacre è un gioco semplice e divertente, che riesce a divertire, sia in singolo (grazie all'IA avanzata dei nemici) che in multyplayer
Ci sono tre modalità e tutte e tre sono ben studiate e progettate.
Molto bello lo stile retro e la soundtrack rock!

Insomma, Hyperdrive Massacre è un buon gioco, che riesce ad intrattenevi per parecchie ore, soprattutto con gli amici!

reviewText:
This is a lot of fun especially in local multiplayer!
Last night with my friends we played this game non stop, laughing a lot and hating each other on the space soccer fields and the last man standing arena :)
In single player mode you basically train with an AI that is best then you and all of your friends out of the box, even in normal mode 0.0 (had fun but Maaaaaaan that needs a lot of focus!)
RECOMMENDED
